thread.title: EAGLE CANYON - Be it for a day or a lifetime - Where memories are made! | Midrand Reporter
thread.title_full: EAGLE CANYON - Be it for a day or a lifetime - Where memories are made! | Midrand Reporter

author: Irfaan Ramzan
title: EAGLE CANYON - Be it for a day or a lifetime - Where memories are made! | Midrand Reporter
text:
Within the bustling suburbs, you will find an oasis, where nature and lifestyle seamlessly intersect.
Once an old quarry, this has been transformed into the Estate, Country Club and Golf Course it is today. Here strangers become family, communities are created, and a sense of wellbeing is found.
This secure estate consists of mixed residential options, from established freestanding homes and sectional titles complexes, to two free-standing developments currently underway.
Image: Supplied The Country Club boasts a Colorado Links 18-hole golf course, driving range, golf academy and halfway house, gym, restaurant and bar and award-winning spa and hair salon.
The Estate itself has multiple play parks and green belt areas. Take a stroll around the Estate, through the Bird Sanctuary or around the golf course. Fitness enthusiasts can play tennis, run and cycle or fish on one of our many dams.
Image: Supplied Visit us and discover why this is the best place to live in Joburg!
Find out more here
